pages.text: The Purple Haze Strain$(br2)Base THC: ??% $(br)Base CBD: ??% $(br)Effect: ??
Purple Haze Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Purple Haze Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Purple Haze Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Purple Haze Weed in an Extractor
You can package your purple haze weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
